boardPhysics

Interface Gadget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Absorber, CircularBumper, Flipper, OuterWall, SquareBumper, TriangularBumper

    public interface Gadget

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      Initiates the action of the gadget in response to a trigger
      boolean connect(Gadget g)
      Treats the activation of this gadget as a trigger for another gadget
      boolean disconnect(Gadget g)
      Removes a gadget from from the triggers of this gadget
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of this gadget in units of L
      java.lang.String getID()
      Returns the unique identifier for the gadget
      double getReflec()
      Returns the coefficient of reflection of this gadget
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of this gadget in units of L
      int getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of this gadget
      int getY()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of this gadget
      void trigger()
      Trigger this gadget and all the gadgets it is connected to in response to a ball colliding with it

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(Gadget g)
        Treats the activation of this gadget as a trigger for another gadget
        Parameters:
        g - The gadget that needs to be connected to this
        Returns:
        A boolean representing a properly achieved connection

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect(Gadget g)
        Removes a gadget from from the triggers of this gadget
        Parameters:
        g - The gadget that needs to be disconnected from this
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether disconnection was properly achieved

      • getX

        int getX()
        Returns the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of this gadget
        Returns:
        an integer representing the x-coordinate of the gadget's origin

      • getY

        int getY()
        Returns the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of this gadget
        Returns:
        an integer representing the y-coordinate of the gadget's origin

      • getID

        java.lang.String getID()
        Returns the unique identifier for the gadget
        Returns:
        a string representing a unique identifier for the gadget

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns the width of this gadget in units of L
        Returns:
        an integer representing the width of the gadget

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns the height of this gadget in units of L
        Returns:
        an integer representing the height of the gadget

      • getReflec

        double getReflec()
        Returns the coefficient of reflection of this gadget
        Returns:
        an double between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive) representing the coefficient of reflection

      • action

        void action()
        Initiates the action of the gadget in response to a trigger

      • trigger

        void trigger()
        Trigger this gadget and all the gadgets it is connected to in response to a ball colliding with it
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball that hit and triggered this gadget
